name: Straight to the middle pocket
description: Try to clear all of the reds without missing. After each stroke the white ball is placed in front of the red ball.

name: Straight into the corner
description: Try to clear all of the reds without missing. This exercise introduces long strokes. Even a small deviation causes the ball to miss.

name: White among the colors
description: White control more important than hit. In this exercise, we control the cue ball position only by the force of the strike. Hit the entire sequence of colored balls in one go.

name: Six colors in pocket
description: Starting from anywhere try to clear all of the balls in sequence, starting with yellow. Play specific position on each shot and keep distance between cue ball and object ball to a minimum.
